name: Chongyun
quote: Once I have rid this world of all evil spirits, I... I will break with my abstinence, and go to the hot springs!
description: An exorcist who roams the land with Liyue as his base of operations, evil spirits fleeing wherever he goes. As the heir to a clan of exorcists, he has always possessed abilities superior to most. However, these abilities are not the result of training, but of an inborn trait â€” congenital positivity.
